mapper.select: SELECT IDL.IDL_ID as idlId, IDL.MEM_ID as memId, IDL.IDL_TITLE as idlTitle, IDL.IDL_CREATED_AT as idlCreatedAt, IDL.IDL_DEL_YN as idlDelYn, COUNT(ID.IQ_ID) as questionCount FROM INTERVIEW_DETAIL_LIST IDL LEFT JOIN INTERVIEW_DETAIL ID ON IDL.IDL_ID = ID.IDL_ID WHERE IDL.IDL_DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY IDL.IDL_ID, IDL.MEM_ID, IDL.IDL_TITLE, IDL.IDL_CREATED_AT, IDL.IDL_DEL_YN ORDER BY IDL.IDL_CREATED_AT DESC
SELECT DISTINCT IQ.IQ_GUBUN as iqGubun, CC.CC_NAME as industryName FROM INTERVIEW_QUESTION IQ INNER JOIN COM_CODE CC ON IQ.IQ_GUBUN = CC.CC_ID WHERE CC.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CC.CC_NAME

SELECT IQ.IQ_ID as iqId, IQ.IQ_GUBUN as iqGubun, IQ.IQ_CONTENT as iqContent, IQ.IQ_SUGGEST as iqSuggest, ID.ID_ORDER as idOrder FROM INTERVIEW_DETAIL ID INNER JOIN INTERVIEW_QUESTION IQ ON ID.IQ_ID = IQ.IQ_ID WHERE ID.IDL_ID = #{idlId} ORDER BY ID.ID_ORDER ASC
SELECT IQ_ID as iqId, IQ_GUBUN as iqGubun, IQ_CONTENT as iqContent, IQ_SUGGEST as iqSuggest FROM INTERVIEW_QUESTION WHERE IQ_GUBUN = #{industryCode} FETCH FIRST #{questionCount} ROWS ONLY
